origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'CryptoMarketAPI.get_liquidity_assessment', 'description': 'This function provides liquidity assessment for a specified cryptocurrency, including historical data, real-time market data, and liquidity analysis based on the latest research articles.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'cryptoName', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The name of the cryptocurrency to assess.'}, {'name': 'date', 'type': 'DATE', 'description': 'The date for historical transaction data.'}, {'name': 'articleCount', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'The number of latest research articles to retrieve.'}], 'optional_parameters': [{'name': 'realTimeData', 'type': 'BOOLEAN', 'description': 'Whether to include real-time market data.'}, {'name': 'liquidityAnalysis', 'type': 'BOOLEAN', 'description': 'Whether to include liquidity analysis.'}], 'return_data': [{'name': 'liquidityAssessment', 'description': 'The liquidity assessment of the specified cryptocurrency.'}]}请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 CryptoMarketAPI.get_liquidity_assessment, 它的参数输入如下: 'cryptoName'是'Curve', 'date'是'2027-01-01', 'articleCount'是'3', 'realTimeData'是'true', 'liquidityAnalysis'是'true'.
